# Extracting channels

**API Collection**

Extract one channel from a four-channel interleaved buffer.

## Extracting channels

- **vImageExtractChannel_ARGB8888(_:_:_:_:)**: Extracts a single channel from an 8-bit-per-channel, 4-channel interleaved buffer and writes the result to an 8-bit planar buffer.
- **vImageExtractChannel_ARGB16U(_:_:_:_:)**: Extracts a single channel from an unsigned 16-bit-per-channel, 4-channel interleaved buffer and writes the result to an unsigned 16-bit planar buffer.
- **vImageExtractChannel_ARGBFFFF(_:_:_:_:)**: Extracts a single channel from a 32-bit-per-channel, 4-channel interleaved buffer and writes the result to a 32-bit planar buffer.
